posts.post_content:
Looking for a decent front since I'm displaying this along with other HOFer portraits.  Wrinkles, creases, paperloss to back all ok.

Thanks,

Eric

I am pretty sure William Chapell has one.  I recommend him highly.  It was a BVG 1 if I recall correctly, priced at $100 or $115....you should correspond with him, good guy, reasonable prices. Tell him Todd told you to get in touch. I saw him at Chantilly last weekend.

[url]william@chappellcards.com[/url].
